title: How to Dress for Going Shopping

steps.title: It is not fun to take tennis shoes off and then put them right back on, so in the summer, go with flips flops, and in the winter go with slip on tennis shoes with no laces.
steps.content: It is not fun to take tennis shoes off and then put them right back on, so in the summer, go with flips flops , and in the winter go with slip on tennis shoes with no laces. Although you should wear comfortable shoes, make sure you bring a pair of shoes that you're going to be coordinating with the different looks you're trying. [1] X Expert Source Dina Scherer Wardrobe Stylist & Personal Shopper Expert Interview. 24 August 2021.

steps.title: Tight clothes are hard to get on and off, so you won't have fun while you're out.
steps.content: Tight clothes are hard to get on and off, so you won't have fun while you're out.

steps.title: Collared shirts tend to be a pain while trying to get back on.
steps.content: Collared shirts tend to be a pain while trying to get back on. Wear a regular shirt that is easy to get in and out of.

steps.title: Suggestions for guys are loose pants or shorts.
steps.content: Suggestions for guys are loose pants or shorts . Basically, wear bottoms that you can change out of easily.

steps.title: Big loop earrings get stuck in hair and clothes and it may be a frustration in the dressing room if jewelry gets tangled.
steps.content: Big loop earrings get stuck in hair and clothes and it may be a frustration in the dressing room if jewelry gets tangled. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Always bring along an extra pair of jeans, camisoles, or tops, depending on what you need to buy.
steps.content: Always bring along an extra pair of jeans, camisoles, or tops, depending on what you need to buy.

steps.title: Wear colors that will match with anything you try on so that you can more easily envision yourself in the clothes you try on.
